  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(EventForClient message)
      Description copied from interface: Observer
      Represents the update to do about the object T
      Parameters:
      message - the object which have to be updated

    • run

      public void run()
      This is the main methods of the CLI. Here, the choice of which method is to call is handled by the usage of future string type and some cycles. When an event is received by the network, it is put in the array blocking queue and it is captured by the object MessageHandler. Then the stringFuture is updated and the correct method is called.

    • launch

      public void launch()

    • logIn

      public java.lang.String logIn() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Here, the chose name phase is handled
      Returns:
      the nickname chosen by the client
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the reader is interrupted

    • numberOfPlayers

      public int numberOfPlayers() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Here, the selection of the number of player to play the game is handled
      Returns:
      the number of player chosen by the client
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the reader is interrupted

    • chooseGodsDeck

      public java.util.List<Gods> chooseGodsDeck() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Here, the entire list of gods is printed. Then, the client has to choose 2 or 3 gods. It depend by the Gods Number attribute set when the event was arrived.
      Returns:
      a list of God which the client has chosen for the game
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the reader is interrupted

    • chooseGodsPlayers

      public Gods chooseGodsPlayers() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Here, the client has to chose the god which he wants to play the game
      Returns:
      the god chosen
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the reader is interrupted

    • askMove

      public Coordinates askMove() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      The client has to write the coordinates where he wants to move his worker selected in the previously phase
      Returns:
      the coordinates where to move the selected worker
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the reader is interrupted

    • askBuild

      public org.javatuples.Pair<Coordinates,​Level> askBuild() throws java.lang.InterruptedException

      Returns:
      the pair with coordinates on which build and the level to be built
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the reader is interrupted

    • makeDecision

      public boolean makeDecision() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Here, the client has to write yes or not to confirmed or not his decision.
      Returns:
      true if the decision is confirmed false if not
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the reader is interrupted

    • undo

      public boolean undo()
      The client has to confirm or not his selection within 5 seconds
      Returns:
      true if the move has confirmed false if the client wants to modify his selection
